HAPPENING TONIGHT: I‚Äôm hosting a 2022 Tax Season Forum with expert panelists from @IRSnews and other tax assistance organizations, streamed live on my Facebook page starting at 6:00 PM.

Got a question for our experts?  Comment below and your question may be answered tonight!

Tax filing season is upon us!  To help answer your biggest questions, I‚Äôll be hosting a Tax Season Forum with tax experts tomorrow at 6 PM, streamed live on my Facebook page.

Got a question?  Drop it below or get in touch with my office and we‚Äôll see how we can help!

The House-passed #AmericaCOMPETES Act supports our workers and businesses & invests $45 billion to improve our nation‚Äôs supply chains. 

This comprehensive legislation takes the strong action we need to position America to compete‚Äîand win‚Äîon the world stage.

Great rally in Albany today with local leaders and furry friends to support our Post Office!

For too long, our postal workers have been denied the tools to carry out their mission.

With the Postal Service Reform Act, I‚Äôm fighting for accountability and transparency at USPS! https://t.co/jHgCJ6U6tn

https://t.co/gahcHBxcGg

Peter Pryor was a giant in the fight for civil rights. He spent his illustrious legal career taking on anti-discrimination cases and working unceasingly to achieve racial equality‚Äîinspiring countless in the field of law & beyond.

He stands as a true drum major for justice. #BHM

140 million Americans‚Äîincluding many in our Capital Region‚Äîlive within 3 miles of a brownfield site.

That‚Äôs why I supported $1.5 billion to clean up these sites in our #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw. See my remarks on restoring brownfields during today's #SubEnviroClimate hearing. https://t.co/Kn22q9tMZk

Today‚Äôs @HouseScience hearing on the microelectronics workforce shows why we need to invest in this emerging industry. 

By training the next generation of innovators, we can ensure American leadership in this crucial field for generations to come!
https://t.co/LvneNo1R9f

Wendell King was a pioneer in the field of radio, starting one of our region‚Äôs first radio stations from his North Troy home at the age of 12.

He later shattered workplace barriers as an engineer at GE and spent his life developing advancements in radio technology. #BHM

Albany resident Sgt. Henry Johnson‚Äôs heroism is beyond inspirational. For his service in WWI, France made him the 1st American recipient of the Croix de Guerre in 1918. Nearly a century later, his valor was recognized with the highest U.S. military award‚Äîthe Medal of Honor. https://t.co/leNjJQqc3j

Let‚Äôs show America love this Valentine‚Äôs Day by making sure all our neighbors have a home. 

It‚Äôs time to #PassBuildBackBetter with $150 billion in fair and affordable housing investments. #ShowHousingLove üíò

Centuries after she rose to prominence as America‚Äôs foremost female sculptor, Edmonia Lewis‚Äîborn in Rensselaer‚Äîcontinues to be recognized for her pioneering work & artistic talents, and was recently featured on her own U.S. postage stamp! #BHM
https://t.co/q84n38FleT

Judge James C. Matthews was the first Black graduate of Albany Law School & first Black judge in NYS.

He used his astounding intellect to successfully argue a case to desegregate Albany public schools and led an effort to pass legislation to protect the rights of Black teachers. https://t.co/VYIsxrDQst

In the mid-1800s, Adam Blake Jr. was among the most successful entrepreneurs and businessmen in the region. The son of an enslaved father, his numerous groundbreaking achievements include building the landmark Kenmore Hotel on Albany‚Äôs North Pearl St. #BHM
https://t.co/w3GzjfN56f

Solomon Northup is known today for his memoir: Twelve Years a Slave, which detailed the horrors he endured after being kidnapped and sold into slavery in 1841.

After regaining his freedom, he returned to the Capital Region and gave moving lectures on the abolitionist movement.

At the Battle of Saratoga, more than 400 Black men bravely fought side by side with white soldiers, helping turn the tide in the Revolutionary War.

We must never forget their service and sacrifice in the name of our freedom. #BHM
https://t.co/asH3TvGlHv.

Over the coming days, I‚Äôll be highlighting some of the Black trailblazers who have called our Capital Region home. From Edmonia Lewis to Peter Pryor, these visionaries have made invaluable contributions to our region & nation. Read my newsletter for more:

https://t.co/NLNtsLdwH6

Black history is American history.

This month and every month, let us draw inspiration from the courage of the Black leaders and pioneers who have helped shape our nation and our region as we continue working to fulfill America‚Äôs promise of liberty and justice for all. #BHM

Thrilled to receive a 100% rating from @HSLegFund for their 2021 Humane Scorecard. 

I look forward to our continued partnership as we fight to enact legislation that supports and protects our furry friends!
https://t.co/KEbIKTMxCI

#ElectrifyingAmerica will help us combat the climate crisis and create good-paying jobs right here at home.

Thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, New York will receive nearly $26 million this year to invest in electric vehicle charging infrastructure.

By shifting to electric vehicles, we can fight climate change AND invest in American workers and manufacturing.

The #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw is providing BILLIONS in funding to #ElectrifyAmerica and build out our EV infrastructure to make charging more accessible for all.

New York‚Äôs future is electric ‚ö°

Thanks to the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw I supported, New York communities are receiving nearly $26 million this year to build EV charging infrastructure and create good-paying jobs. 
#ElectrifyingAmerica

Honored to preside as Speaker Pro Tempore as the House passed the #GlobalRespectAct. 

With the passage of this bill, Congress is sending a clear message to the LGBTQI+ community at home and abroad: atrocious acts of violence against you will not be tolerated‚Äîwe stand with you. https://t.co/gRQhJlb02z

Our fight for LGBTQI+ equality cannot stop at our borders. 

Today I will stand with the House to pass H.R. 3485, the #GlobalRespectAct, to ensure that our fight for justice includes protecting victims of violence and persecution around the world.

The #PostalServiceReformAct:

üì™ Ensures USPS is finally on a sustainable financial footing
üì™ Requires USPS to deliver both mail & packages at least 6 days per week
üì™ Develops an online system to track performance & promote accountability

Proud to vote YES to pass this bill!

We must be clear-eyed about what social media companies are teaching our kids.

I'm joining @RepSusanWild in calling on @YouTube to remove "How To Tie a Noose" videos, which could be the difference between life and death for kids considering suicide. #SaferInternetDay

Millions of Americans rely on @USPS everyday to deliver their life-saving medications, urgent packages, and much more.

That‚Äôs why I‚Äôm voting YES today on the bipartisan #PostalServiceReformAct to finally get USPS on the solid financial footing it needs to carry out its mission.

That‚Äôs why I support the Due Process #ContinuityofCare Act.

We must treat people as innocent until proven guilty.  This bill ensures vulnerable people get the care they need.

An Albany native, decorated Vietnam veteran, businessman, and family man, Sgt. Taylor‚Äôs life of service is an example to us all. https://t.co/d17idWbPJ5

My deepest condolences to his wife, Barbara, and to his children and grandchildren.
He believed wholeheartedly in the dream and vision of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and helped further that vision throughout his illustrious legal career.

The opportunities for our nation & the needs of our planet are too great to delay any longer.

Under this initiative, the DOE will improve coordination between state and local governments, grid operators, and other key stakeholders to help speed up these projects‚Äîwhich can often take a decade to finish‚Äîto ensure we achieve a pollution-free electricity system by 2035.

We must act to save our democracy.

It is time for the Senate to pass the Freedom to Vote Act and the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act to safeguard our republic for future generations.

Two bills I authored‚Äîthe #MATAct and Medicaid Reentry Act‚Äîwould address this epidemic, providing hope & a path forward for countless individuals. Let's get it done.

The Medicaid coverage gap leaves 4 million low-income Americans without coverage or good access to health care. The #BuildBackBetter Act closes that gap, expanding access to the ACA marketplace to millions nationwide.

2021 brought new challenges, but also new hopes and new successes. With the #AmericanRescuePlan and the #BIF, we strengthened our economy as we fought #COVID19.

In 2022, I look forward to more action to address the climate crisis and support working families!

#HappyNewYear

As the #ClimateCrisis worsens with each passing day, we must rise to the challenge. 

The #BuildBackBetter Act meets the moment by investing boldly in disadvantaged communities, boosting our economy, and moving toward a clean energy future.

No one should have to choose between paying for lifesaving insulin and other basic necessities like food and rent. That‚Äôs why I support the historic #BuildBackBetter Act, which lowers insulin prices to just $35 a month for Americans with diabetes.

We took powerful steps to address the climate crisis with our Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, making key investments in clean energy transmission, electric vehicle infrastructure & much more. 

We cannot stop there. We must #BuildBackBetter.

May the new year bring bountiful blessings to you all!

As we gather to celebrate the holidays with friends and family, we are reminded of the importance of love and community.

Jobs in #CleanEnergy fields have median hourly wages about 25% higher than the national wage, making them a strong investment.

The #BuildBackBetter Act creates more of these good paying jobs, growing the economy while slashing greenhouse gas emissions. We must get this done.

That‚Äôs why I‚Äôm proud to support the #BuildBackBetter Act, which invests billions to create a 21st Century energy grid capable of delivering reliable, clean energy throughout the nation.

The Biden Administration's plan takes critical steps to remove lead from our communities. Let's get it done!
